author: jgm
content: That usually means that your tx is invalid somehow. You can look at https://github.com/wealdtech/ethereal for an example of generating these transactions (or just use it to generate the txs if you prefer).

author: _kernelkennethg
content: is there a genesis file and configuration for prague that i could start geth locally ? so that i could debug the issue locally ?

content: Hi i looked at the repo, i could see how it creates the signed transaction by receiving the txn data ... but i can't see how it actually builds the transaction lol .. i feel that it is doing much like what im doing in my js codes. Do let me know if i overlooked any files .. ty >. <

author: jgm
content:
It's the code starting at https://github.com/wealdtech/ethereal/blob/b8246ba0365ebf1415a48f92c8c875ffa7bcedda/cmd/validator/common.go#L185

(You may be better off continuing the conversation in the ethstaker discord https://discord.gg/ethstaker as this discord is for R&D of the protocol.)
